io.name: SSUIUPIA0020301_INBOUND

<complexType name="ASGNR_APTM_BSIC_LST_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="asgnrId"> <annotation> <documentation>담당자ID</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SSUIUPIA0020301_outbound" /> <complexType name="SSUIUPIA0020301_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="procRstCd"> <annotation> <documentation>처리결과코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
